name: Crypts of Dasheria
description:
INSTRUCTIONS

You dash with the left mouse button.

You only have a limited amount of dashes (you start with one), and you get dashes back when killing enemies. Losing a heart (if it isn't the last) will kill all enemies and reset your current dashes back to your maximum. The maximum amount of dashes (amongst other things) can be upgraded in the shop, which spawns after every third wave.

Credits:

Music by:  TeknoAXE's Royalty Free Music

SFX created with: Bfxr

Everything else is created by me.
